name: INFINHIT
description:
Take down ennemies and bosses with your gun to score

Be careful as your bullets are coming back at you...

but more bullet on screen increase your score

Will you survive yourself ?

Game created for the VGLJ2021

Theme : Arcade | Time : 60 hours

Pixelsoba Programming

Kemsou Game Design / Programming 

Blooue Programming

Nighked Game Art / Music

Control

ZQSD to move

Left click to shoot

Engine: Godot
